Effect Description: You naturally float in water. You have Advantage on Athletics checks to swim in rough water.
When you take Bludgeoning damage, you can reduce the damage by your Constitution modifier.
You can move sideways or backwards at full speed without penalty.
Fold your limbs tight against your body to fit into spaces one size smaller than you.
Advantage on checks to avoid being Moved, Shoved, or Pulled against your will.
You can adhere to smooth surfaces (glass, wet stone) and climb without checks.
You cannot be knocked Prone while underwater.
Charge through water. If you move 20ft, your next attack deals extra slashing damage.
When attacked, release an ink cloud (5ft radius). Attackers are Blinded and you can Disengage.
Spray ink on the ground. It becomes difficult terrain; creatures must save (Dex) or fall Prone.
Match your surroundings perfectly. Turn Invisible until you move or attack.
Rapidly cycle colors to confuse an enemy. Target has Disadvantage on their next attack.
Your bite attacks deal Bleed damage (1d4) at the start of the target's next turn.
If you lose teeth (or break them on armor), they grow back fully after a Long Rest.
Gain +2 AC against a single melee attack by turning your armored side to the blow.
Slam your armored body into an enemy. Deal Bludgeoning damage and shove them 5ft.
If you have a target Grappled, deal automatic Bludgeoning damage to them.
You can use your large claw as a Shield (+2 AC) if you are not holding anything in it.
Your melee reach increases by 5ft.
Attempt to Grapple a target. If successful, they are Restrained (cannot move or attack easily).
Touch attack. Target takes Lightning damage and cannot take Reactions until their next turn.
Detect the heartbeat (electricity) of living creatures within 10ft, even through walls.
You gain a Swim Speed equal to your Walk Speed.
Blast a wave of water at a target. They must save (Strength) or be pushed back 10ft.
Shine your light in darkness. A creature that looks at it must save (Will) or move toward you.
Flare your light. Creatures within 10ft must save (Con) or be Blinded for 1 round.
You can hold your breath for 1 hour.
Spray a high-pressure jet of water. Extinguish fires or blind a target for 1 turn.
Amplify your voice. All creatures in 30ft can hear you clearly, even underwater.
Swallow an object size Small or smaller to carry it safely in your pouch.
Enemies that Grapple you take Slashing damage every turn from your rough skin.
You have Advantage on checks to maintain a Grapple on slippery enemies.
Advantage on checks to escape a Grapple or bindings.
You can breathe underwater as long as your skin remains wet.
Sting a target. They must save (Con) or be Paralyzed for 1 round.
Make a quick sting attack against an enemy flanking you.
Your skin acts as a grinding tool; you can wear through ropes or wood over time.
Reduce damage from a Slashing attack by half (scales are hard as teeth).
You have no penalty to Perception (Hearing) while underwater.
Your Swim speed increases by +10ft (drag reduction).
Stretch your arm to reach an object or ledge up to 10ft away.
Move through any opening large enough for your beak/head without slowing down.
Catch a small moving object (fish, arrow, coin) out of the air/water.
Advantage on Sleight of Hand checks to manipulate fine mechanisms.
Advantage on Stealth checks while submerged in water.
You are immune to the effects of extreme water pressure.

Type: Advantage on checks to escape Grapple (Renamed from Grease).
